name: Frightfur Reborn
text: Target 1 "Frightfur" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the Graveyard: You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 of your banished "Fluffal" or "Frightfur" monsters; return it to the Graveyard.
